item.title: Firestore UI Pagination for chatting
item.description: The default behaviour of the recyclerview in Android is adding the new item to the top of its list when this is not the best practice for a chatting UI that needs to add a new item to the bottom of the list then scroll to the last item (the newly added), so in this short tutorial we will show how we can make this possible in two simple steps.
